# google\_vmwareengine\_datastore

Use this data source to get details about a datastore resource.

To get more information about datastore, see:
* [API documentation](https://docs.cloud.google.com/vmware-engine/docs/vmware-ecosystem/concepts-nfs-datastores-overview)

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "google_vmwareengine_datastore" "test_ds" {
  name     = "example-ds"
  location = "us-west2"
}
```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

* `name` - (Required) Name of the resource.
* `location` - (Required) either regional or zonal location of the resource.

## Attributes Reference

See [google_vmwareengine_datastore](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/google/latest/docs/resources/vmwareengine_datastore#attributes-reference) resource for details of all the available attributes.
